pERCEPTOR::


"Then "said the male while he came in"What's the next step? who's in 
our side?"


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "x_rauq_x" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
> -- Switchblade --
> 
> Switchblade smiles and thinks to himself, <Wise choise...>.
> 
> "Alright." He focuses again on Perceptor, the defenses disarm 
> themselves and retract, and the side entrance of the Dark Avian 
> opens. "Enter, I am in the control room."
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2000@y...> wrote:
> > Perceptor::
> > 
> > "Decepticons don't need weak leaders, if MEgatron couldn't keep 
> > Decepticons' leadership then he didn't decerve it... I'm with 
you" 
> > answered Perceptor
